title: Plat 5 look to join a plat ranked team
body:
I like to play adc and mid when ever i can the highest i have ever been is plat 1 promos.I recently just started to get back into the game.
use to have a diamond team but has decayed to gold 1 atm and we could use if it if you dont want to start from scratch.
I Main jinx and ahri but play all champs

replies.body: Hi, add me IGN dafaq probably we can continue on the gold1 you have. I am plat 5 myself and pref top lane.
